languages.text: "И взмолилась праведница Владыке, моля Его поведать, кто замыслил сгубить ее. И внял Он кличу ее — исторглось враново перо изо рта девы и, аки Его дланью ведомое, вывело имена тех, кто скверну предательства в умах пестовал. Легенда о святой Кирине, стих пятнадцатый. Это знак, {name}".

"And the righteous woman prayed to the Master, beseeching Him to reveal who had plotted to destroy her. And He heeded her call, and the feather of a raven sprang from the maiden's mouth and, as if guided by His hand, brought forth the names of those who had nurtured foul treachery in their minds. The Legend of Saint Quirine, verse 15. It is a sign, {name}."
languages.original_text: "И взмолилась праведница Владыке, моля Его поведать, кто замыслил сгубить ее. И внял Он кличу ее — исторглось враново перо изо рта девы и, аки Его дланью ведомое, вывело имена тех, кто скверну предательства в умах пестовал. Легенда о святой Кирине, стих пятнадцатый. Это знак, {name}".

languages.text: «Y la justa mujer rezó por el Maestro, buscando saber quién había intentado destruirla. Y Él atendió sus plegarias, de la boca de la dama brotó la pluma de un cuervo y, como si el propio Maestro la guiara, mentó a aquellos que habían conjurado tal infame traición en sus mentes. Leyenda de santa Quirine, versículo 15. Es una señal, {name}».
languages.original_text: "And the righteous woman prayed to the Master, beseeching Him to reveal who had plotted to destroy her. And He heeded her call, and the feather of a raven sprang from the maiden's mouth and, as if guided by His hand, brought forth the names of those who had nurtured foul treachery in their minds. The Legend of Saint Quirine, verse 15. It is a sign, {name}."

traits.locale_text: «Y la justa mujer rezó por el Maestro, buscando saber quién había intentado destruirla. Y Él atendió sus plegarias, de la boca de la dama brotó la pluma de un cuervo y, como si el propio Maestro la guiara, mentó a aquellos que habían conjurado tal infame traición en sus mentes. Leyenda de santa Quirine, versículo 15. Es una señal, {name}».

languages.text: 「そして、正しき女は、自分を滅ぼそうと企てた者を明らかにしてくださるよう、主に祈りました。すると、主は彼女の呼びかけに耳を傾け、乙女の口から一羽の鴉の羽が飛び出し、主の御手に導かれるかのように、汚らわしい裏切りを心に育んだ者たちの名を明らかにしました。聖キリーヌ伝説、15節。それは何かの印なのです、{name}」
languages.original_text: "And the righteous woman prayed to the Master, beseeching Him to reveal who had plotted to destroy her. And He heeded her call, and the feather of a raven sprang from the maiden's mouth and, as if guided by His hand, brought forth the names of those who had nurtured foul treachery in their minds. The Legend of Saint Quirine, verse 15. It is a sign, {name}."

traits.locale_text: 「そして、正しき女は、自分を滅ぼそうと企てた者を明らかにしてくださるよう、主に祈りました。すると、主は彼女の呼びかけに耳を傾け、乙女の口から一羽の鴉の羽が飛び出し、主の御手に導かれるかのように、汚らわしい裏切りを心に育んだ者たちの名を明らかにしました。聖キリーヌ伝説、15節。それは何かの印なのです、{name}」

languages.text: “‘于是，那义人便向主人祷告，求祂指明是谁图谋要害她性命。祂回应了义人的呼唤，一根乌鸦的羽毛从少女的嘴里飞了出来。羽毛仿佛得到了祂的引导，写出了心怀背叛的恶人之名。’《圣奎里恩传》，第十五节。这是个印记，{name}。”
languages.original_text: "And the righteous woman prayed to the Master, beseeching Him to reveal who had plotted to destroy her. And He heeded her call, and the feather of a raven sprang from the maiden's mouth and, as if guided by His hand, brought forth the names of those who had nurtured foul treachery in their minds. The Legend of Saint Quirine, verse 15. It is a sign, {name}."

traits.locale_text: “‘于是，那义人便向主人祷告，求祂指明是谁图谋要害她性命。祂回应了义人的呼唤，一根乌鸦的羽毛从少女的嘴里飞了出来。羽毛仿佛得到了祂的引导，写出了心怀背叛的恶人之名。’《圣奎里恩传》，第十五节。这是个印记，{name}。”

languages.text: "Und die rechtschaffene Frau betete zum Meister und flehte Ihn an, ihr zu offenbaren, wen er mit ihrem Tod betraut hatte. Und Er erhörte ihren Ruf und die Feder eines Raben spross aus dem Mund des Mädchens und brachte die Namen all jener hervor, in deren Verstand sich gemeiner Verrat geregt hatte, als wäre sie von Seiner Hand geführt worden. Die Legende des Heiligen Quirine, Vers 15. Das ist ein Zeichen, {name}."
languages.original_text: "And the righteous woman prayed to the Master, beseeching Him to reveal who had plotted to destroy her. And He heeded her call, and the feather of a raven sprang from the maiden's mouth and, as if guided by His hand, brought forth the names of those who had nurtured foul treachery in their minds. The Legend of Saint Quirine, verse 15. It is a sign, {name}."

traits.locale_text: "Und die rechtschaffene Frau betete zum Meister und flehte Ihn an, ihr zu offenbaren, wen er mit ihrem Tod betraut hatte. Und Er erhörte ihren Ruf und die Feder eines Raben spross aus dem Mund des Mädchens und brachte die Namen all jener hervor, in deren Verstand sich gemeiner Verrat geregt hatte, als wäre sie von Seiner Hand geführt worden. Die Legende des Heiligen Quirine, Vers 15. Das ist ein Zeichen, {name}."

languages.text: « "La femme supplia le Maître de lui révéler qui avait comploté pour la détruire. Il entendit sa prière. Une plume de corbeau jaillit de la bouche de la jeune fille et, comme guidée par Sa main, se mit à inscrire les noms de ceux qui avaient fomenté cette infâme trahison dans leur esprit." La Légende de Sainte Quirine, verset 15. C'est un signe, {name}. »
languages.original_text: "And the righteous woman prayed to the Master, beseeching Him to reveal who had plotted to destroy her. And He heeded her call, and the feather of a raven sprang from the maiden's mouth and, as if guided by His hand, brought forth the names of those who had nurtured foul treachery in their minds. The Legend of Saint Quirine, verse 15. It is a sign, {name}."

traits.locale_text: « "La femme supplia le Maître de lui révéler qui avait comploté pour la détruire. Il entendit sa prière. Une plume de corbeau jaillit de la bouche de la jeune fille et, comme guidée par Sa main, se mit à inscrire les noms de ceux qui avaient fomenté cette infâme trahison dans leur esprit." La Légende de Sainte Quirine, verset 15. C'est un signe, {name}. »

languages.text: "O erdemli kadın ki O'na dua etti. Dualarında kendisini yok etme komploları kuranları açığa çıkarması için O'na yalvardı. O da kadının çağrısına kulak verdi. Genç kadının ağzından bir kuzgun tüyü çıktı ve âdeta O'nun eliyle hareket edercesine zihninde ihanet tohumları yeşertmiş olanların isimlerini gün yüzüne çıkardı. Azize Quirine'in Efsanesi, 15. mısra. Bu bir işaret {name}."
languages.original_text: "And the righteous woman prayed to the Master, beseeching Him to reveal who had plotted to destroy her. And He heeded her call, and the feather of a raven sprang from the maiden's mouth and, as if guided by His hand, brought forth the names of those who had nurtured foul treachery in their minds. The Legend of Saint Quirine, verse 15. It is a sign, {name}."
